name: Pocket Soldier
description:
Fight strange enemies using your gun or a sword and jump between platforms.

-Old school run and gun snes-like game style

-Win 100 points for complete every level collecting coins and killing enemies. You can't cheat on this game, sorry.

-Horizontal and vertical moving platforms and falling platforms!

-Take care with the evil spikes!

-Day/night cycles.

-2 difficulty modes: normal and hard.

-Ammo and health items.

-Intelligent bullets item spawner system.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows for move the player

Up arrow for shoot

Down arrow for change weapon (only if sword is already picked)

Spacebar for jump

Esc for pause the game
